AboutMe: I'm currently learning Japanese, I knew it would take a while but with all the ambiguity and subtle dishonesty of Japanese learning resources, the it will take has seemed to extend itself. However I am determined to do it, and I hope this site helps a bit. Research takes time and even after hours, days, weeks, or longer of searching for an answer to one question alone, some searches wont be fruitful. Hopefully if long research comes up with no results I can ask here and move from here.
